title: Probando un Pipe
description: Programa escrito en C  con los flags -Wall -Werror -Wextra que replica el comportamiento de un pipe en la Shell mediante un pequeño programa

title: Reescribiendo Printf
description: Programa escrito en C que recrea la función variadica para la salida estandar llamada printf() con la mayoria de parametros para su formato

title: P1
description: Welcome to P1, your virtual pit stop for the latest updates and standings in the world of F1. But that's not all—we've also got the ultimate card game where driver knowledge is the key to victory.

title: Planner
description: Make every hour count with this simple Daily Planner App. You can keep track of all important appointments during a normal 9-5 work day!
